noun.description: A smell that is only smelled briefly or faintly.
examples: I caught a whiff of peachy perfume

noun.description: A puff or breath of air or smoke.
(chiefly in baseball or golf) an unsuccessful attempt to hit the ball.

verb.description: Get a brief or faint smell of.
examples: he screwed up his nose as if he'd whiffed Limburger

verb.description: (chiefly in baseball or golf) try unsuccessfully to hit the ball.
